# HEADON.pro

> Digital agency specializing in modern web development, mobile apps, and UI/UX design for businesses in Main-Tauber-Kreis region (Germany). We build with Next.js, React, TypeScript, and React Native.

HEADON.pro is a digital agency based in Bad Mergentheim, Germany, serving the Main-Tauber-Kreis region and beyond. We specialize in performance-optimized, SEO-first web applications and cross-platform mobile apps. Our tech stack focuses on Next.js 15, React 19, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Supabase for backend services.

**Core Services:**
- Web Development: Next.js/React web applications with SEO optimization, starting at €2,500
- Mobile App Development: iOS & Android apps using React Native or Flutter, starting at €8,000
- UI/UX Design: User research, wireframing, prototyping, and responsive design systems
- Backend Solutions: REST/GraphQL APIs, authentication, database design, and cloud infrastructure

**Regional Focus:**
Primary service areas include Bad Mergentheim, Lauda-Königshofen, Tauberbischofsheim, Wertheim, Würzburg, Heilbronn, and surrounding Main-Tauber-Kreis municipalities. We provide local, German-speaking support for businesses in these regions.

**Industry Expertise:**
Handwerk (tradespeople), Gastronomie (restaurants), Einzelhandel (retail), Fitness & wellness, Immobilien (real estate), Beratung (consulting), and local service businesses.

## Tech Stack & Tools

**Frontend:** Next.js 15, React 19, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS v4, Framer Motion
**Backend:** Supabase (PostgreSQL), Node.js, REST/GraphQL APIs
**Mobile:** React Native, Expo
**Design:** Figma, shadcn/ui components, Radix UI primitives
**DevOps:** Docker, GitHub Actions, Vercel/self-hosted VPS
**Analytics:** Umami (self-hosted), privacy-focused
**Forms:** React Hook Form, Zod validation
**SEO:** Automatic sitemap generation, Schema.org markup, Open Graph tags

## Project Info

**Content Management:**
Content stored in MDX files with frontmatter (gray-matter). Blog posts, portfolio projects, service pages, and regional landing pages all use MDX for structured content with TypeScript validation.

**SEO Strategy:**
Server-Side Rendering (SSR) for all pages, automatic sitemap at `/sitemap.xml`, structured data with Schema.org JSON-LD, optimized meta tags, and Core Web Vitals optimization (90+ Lighthouse scores).

**Development Approach:**
Agile methodology with 2-week sprints, MVP-first development, transparent fixed-price or phase-based pricing, local German-speaking support, and comprehensive documentation.
